participant_1.background:
I have a date with my girlfriend tonight after a long run.
my mother was a famous ballet dancer in london.
i have started creating my own comics and presenting them to publishers.
I take my dog for a walk after I wake up.
i exercise.

participant_2.background:
I loved spending hours in the woods behind my house, making up stories and worlds.
I'm afraid my car will break down while I'm out fishing.
I enjoy visiting the beach, but my favorite exotic place is the island of Bali.
I like to cuddle up with my dog Wonwon on a rainy day.
I collect yarn from different places to use in my crochet projects.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
Good! I am just getting ready to go fishing.
Oh nice! Where are you going?
I am going to the lake down the road. I love spending time in the woods. I used to spend hours in the woods behind my house as a kid, making up stories and worlds.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love making up stories too. I recently started creating my own comics and presenting them to publishers.
That is awesome! I have always wanted to try writing my own comics. I would love to see your work sometime!
Sure! I will send you a link to my website. What do you do for fun?
I love to crochet! I collect yarn from different places to use in my projects. I also like to cuddle up with my dog Wonwon on a rainy day.
That sounds lovely! I have a dog too. I take him for a walk every morning after I wake up. He is a great way to start the day.
That is so cute! I love dogs. I am afraid my car will break down while I am out fishing. It is an old car, but I love it.
I know what you mean! My car is also an old car, but it gets me where I need to go. I have a date with my girlfriend tonight after a long run.
Sounds like you have a busy day ahead of you! Have a good time!
